mapper.insert: INSERT INTO addressbook ( name, email, phoneNumber, homeNumber, fax, nation, address, companyName, deptName, positionName, companyNumber, companyAddress, memo ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{homeNumber}, #{fax}, #{nation}, #{address}, #{companyName}, #{deptName}, #{positionName}, #{companyNumber}, #{companyAddress}, #{memo} )
